components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to Verizon in the United States

incident_updates.body: We are observing an improvement on SMS Delivery Delays to Verizon in the United States. Our engineers are now monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Verizon network in the United States over a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Verizon network in the United States over a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Verizon network in the United States over a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Verizon network in the United States over a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to T-Mobile Network in the US from a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are observing an improvement on SMS Delivery Delays T-Mobile Network in the US from a Subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are now monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to T-Mobile Network in the US from a Subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to T-Mobile Network in the US from a Subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Singapore SMS Carrier Maintenance - StarHub

incident_updates.body: The StarHub network in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 November 2023 at 11:00 PST until 10 November 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from StarHub Singapore handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Spain SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Spain is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 November 2023 at 21:00 PST until 10 November 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Spain handsets via a subset of long codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind (Tre)

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind (Tre) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 November 2023 at 14:00 PST until 12 November 2023 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Verify Silent Network Auth.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Israel SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Israel is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 November 2023 at 21:00 PST until 12 November 2023 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Israel handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre (3)

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind Tre (3) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 November 2023 at 17:00 PST until 12 November 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre (3) Italy customers.

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 November 2023 at 17:01 PST until 13 November 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures from a subset of UK phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 02 November 2023 at 00:00 PDT
08 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 09 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
15 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 16 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
29 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 November 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 29 November 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.
